text:
[Sri Rama slays rakshasas and protects the sacrifice of Viswamitra]

अथ तौ देशकालज्ञौ राजापुत्रावरिन्दमौ।

देशे काले च वाक्यज्ञावब्रूतां कौशिकं वच:।।1.30.1।।
meaning: अथ then, देशकालज्ञौ two knowledgeable persons with regard to time and place, अरिन्दमौ subduers of enemies, देशे in a particular place, काले च and time, वाक्यज्ञौ knowers of speech, तौ both, राजपुत्रौ two princes, कौशिकम् addressing Visvamitra, वच: words, अब्रूताम् they spoke.
translation: Thus spoke the two princes to Viswamitra. They were conscious of place and time to speak and capable of conquering enemies.

text:
भगवन् श्रोतुमिच्छावो यस्मिन् काले निशाचरौ।

संरक्षणीयौ तौ ब्रह्मन्नातिवर्तेत तत्क्षणम्।।1.30.2।।
meaning: भगवन् O Adorable one, ब्रह्मन् O Brahmarshi, तौ निशाचरौ those two rakshasas, यस्मिन् काले in whatever time, संरक्षणीयौ to be protectd, श्रोतुम् to listen, इच्छाव: we are both desirous, तत् क्षणम् that moment, नातिवर्तेत shall not pass away.
translation: "O adorable Brahmarshi, we want to know around what time the rakshasas will make their appearance so that the sacrifice can be protected. Let not that moment pass".

text:
एवं ब्रुवाणौ काकुत्स्थौ त्वरमाणौ युयुत्सया।

सर्वे ते मुनय: प्रीता: प्रशशंसुर्नृपात्मजौ।।1.30.3।।
meaning: काकुत्स्थौ Rama and Lakshmana, एवम् in this manner, ब्रुवाणौ speaking thus, युयुत्सया with a desire to fight rakshasas, त्वरमाणौ with eagerness, नृपात्मजौ two princes, ते मुनय: those sages, सर्वे all, प्रीता: pleased, प्रशशंसु: extolled them.
translation: The sages (of the asrama) were very pleased. They extolled the princes of Kakustha dynasty, who were eager to fight the rakshasas.

text:
अद्यप्रभृति षड्रात्रं रक्षतं राघवौ युवाम्।

दीक्षां गतो ह्येष मुनिर्मौनित्वं च गमिष्यति।।1.30.4।।
meaning: राघवौ Rama and Lakshmana, युवाम् both of you, अद्यप्रभृति from today onwards, षड्रात्रम् six nights, रक्षतम् you may protect, एष: मुनि: this sage Visvamitra, दीक्षाम् initiation ceremony, गत: has entered, मौनित्वं च strict silence also, गमिष्यति will attain.
translation: "O sons of Raghu's lineage protect the sacrifice for six nights from today. With the ceremoney initiated, the sage would observe silence said the inmates".

text:
तौ तु तद्वचनं श्रुत्वा राजपुत्रौ यशस्विनौ।

अनिद्रौ षडहोरात्रं तपोवनमरक्षताम्।।1.30.5।।
meaning: यशस्विनौ the two illustrious, तौ राजपुत्रौ the two princes, तत् वचनम् those words, श्रुत्वा having heard, षडहोरात्रम् six days and six nights, अनिद्रौ without sleep, तपोवनम् Tapovana, अरक्षताम् protected.
translation: At these words of the sages the illustrious princes got ready to protect the tapovana for six days and six nights without sleep.

text:
उपासाञ्चक्रतुर्वीरौ यत्तौ परमधन्विनौ।

ररक्षतुर्मुनिवरं विश्वामित्रमरिन्दमौ।।1.30.6।।
meaning: परमधन्विनौ two mighty archers, वीरौ two heroes, यत्तौ fully equipped, उपासाञ्चक्रतु: attended upon the sacrifice, अरिन्दमौ two destroyers of enemies, विश्वामित्रम् मुनिवरम् Visvamitra maharshi, ररक्षतु: protected.
translation:
The two mighty, heroic archers (Rama and Lakshmana), destroyers of enemies
attended upon the sacrifice in order to protect sage Viswamitra.

text:
अथ काले गते तस्मिन् षष्ठेऽहनि समागते।

सौमित्रिमब्रवीद्रामो यत्तो भव समाहित:।।1.30.7।।
meaning: अथ then, तस्मिन् काले when that period, गते had lapsed, षष्ठे when the sixth, अहनि day, समागते had approached, राम: Rama, सौमित्रिम् addressing Lakshmana, यत्त: be ready, समाहित: भव be vigilant, अब्रनवीत् spoke.
translation: Time passed. When the sixth day arrived Rama cautioned Lakshmana to be vigilant.

text:
रामस्यैवं ब्रुवाणस्य त्वरितस्य युयुत्सया।

प्रजज्वाल ततो वेदिस्सोपाध्यायपुरोहिता।।1.30.8।।
meaning: युयुत्सया with a keen desire to fight, त्वरितस्य eagerly awaiting, रामस्य Rama, एवम् in this manner, ब्रुवाणस्य while speaking, तत: thereafter, सोपाध्यायपुरोहिता surrounded by officiating priests and spiritual guides(reciters of the sacred hymns), वेदि: sacrificial altar, प्रजज्वाल inflammed.
translation: While he was fracing up for a fight, the fire on the sacrificial altar with the officiating priests and spiritual guides suddenly brightened.

text:
सदर्भचमसस्रुक्का ससमित्कुसुमोच्चया।

विश्वामित्रेण सहिता वेदिर्जज्वाल सर्त्विजा।।1.30.9।।
meaning: सदर्भचमसस्रुक्का along with kusa grass,the ladles and square vessels(used in the sacrifice out of which all the worshippers at a sacrifice drink the juice), ससमित्कुसुमोच्चया along with bundles of sticks used in the sacrificial fire and collection of flowers, विश्वामित्रेण सहिता along with Visvamitra, सर्त्विजा along with officiating priests, वेदि: altar, जज्वाल got inflammed.
translation:
The altar with Viswamitra and the officiating priests, kusa grass, ladles and square
vessels, bundles of sticks and flowers, (used in the sacrificfial fire) got brightened up.

text:
मन्त्रवच्च यथान्यायं यज्ञोऽसौ सम्प्रवर्तते।

आकाशे च महान् शब्द: प्रादुरासीद्भयानक:।।1.30.10।।
meaning: असौ यज्ञ: this sacrifice, मन्त्रवत् in accordance with mantras, यथान्यायम् properly, सम्प्रवर्तते was being performed, आकाशे in the sky, भयानक: causing fear, महान् शब्द: great sound, प्रादुरासीत् emerged.
translation: While the sacrifice was being performed in accordance with mantras, a great sound causing fear emerged from the sky.

text:
आवार्य गगनं मेघो यथा प्रावृषि निर्गत:।

तथामायां विकुर्वाणौ राक्षसावभ्यधावताम्।।1.30.11।।
meaning: प्रावृषि in the rainy season, निर्गत: originated, मेघ: clouds, यथा like, तथा similarly, गगनम् sky, आवार्य having covered, राक्षसौ two rakshasas, मायाम् illusion, विकुर्वाणौ displaying, अभ्यधावताम् came running.
translation: Like the clouds in the rainy season, the two rakshasas (Maricha and Subahu), covering the sky through their power of illusion, came running (to the sacrificial place).

text:
मारीचश्च सुबाहुश्च तयोरनुचराश्च ये।

आगम्य भीमसङ्काशा रुधिरौघमवासृजन्।।1.30.12।।
meaning: भीमसङ्काशा fearful appearance, मारीचश्च Maricha, सुबाहश्च Subahu, तयो: their, ये अनुचरा: those of the followers, आगम्य having arrived, रुधिरौघम् streams of blood, अवासृजन् rained.
translation: Maricha and Subahu of fearful appearance arrived with their followers and rained streams of blood (on the sacrificial altar).

text:
सा तेन रुधिरौघेण वेदिर्जज्वाल मण्डिता।

सहसाऽभिद्रुतो रामस्तानपश्य त्ततो दिवि।।1.30.13।।
meaning: तेन रुधिरौघेण by that stream of blood, मण्डिता drenched, सा वेदि: that sacrificial altar, जज्वाल inflammed, तत: then, सहसा immediately, अभिद्रुत: rushed forward, राम: Rama, दिवि in the sky, तान् them, अपश्यत् beheld.
translation: Flames rose on the sacrificial altar drenched by the stream of blood. Immediately Rama rushed forward and beheld them in the sky.

text:
तावापतन्तौ सहसा दृष्ट्वा राजीवलोचन:।

लक्ष्मणं त्वभिसम्प्रेक्ष्य रामो वचनमब्रवीत्।।1.30.14।।
meaning: राजीवलोचन: the lotuseyed, राम: Rama, सहसा suddenly, आपतन्तौ advancing towards, तौ them, दृष्ट्वा having seen, लक्ष्मणम् addressing Lakshmana, अभिसम्प्रेक्ष्य fixing his sight at him, वचनम् these words, अब्रवीत् spoke.
translation: Having seen them (Maricha and Subahu) suddenly advancing the lotuseyed Rama gazed at Lakshmana and said:

text:
पश्य लक्ष्मण दुर्वृत्तान् राक्षसान् पिशिताशनान्।

मानवास्त्रसमाधूताननिलेन यथा घनान्।।1.30.15।।
meaning: लक्ष्मण O Lakshmana, दुर्वृत्तान् wicked behavioured, पिशिताशनान् human flesh eaters, राक्षसान् rakshasas, अनिलेन by wind, घनान् यथा like clouds, मानवास्त्रसमाधूतान् scattered away by Manava astra, पश्य behold.
translation: "O Lakshmana, behold, by manavaastra I shall chase, like clouds scattered by winds those wicked rakshasas who eat human flesh".

text:
मानवं परमोदारमस्त्रं परमभास्वरम्।

चिक्षेप परमक्रुद्धो मारीचोरसि राघव:।।1.30.16।।
meaning: राघव: Rama, परमोदारम् greatly powerful, परमभास्वरम् highly effulgent, मानवम् Manava, अस्त्रम् astra, परमक्रुद्ध: exceedingly furious, मारीचोरसि in the chest of Maricha, चिक्षेप hurled.
translation: The inflamed Rama hurled the highly powerful and effulgent Manavaastra on the chest of Maricha.

text:
स तेन परमास्त्रेण मानवेन समाहित:।

संपूर्णं योजनशतं क्षिप्तस्सागरसम्प्लवे।।1.30.17।।
meaning: तेन by that, मानवेन Manava, परमास्त्रेण powerful astra, समाहित: smitten, स: he, Maricha, सम्पूर्णम् completely at a distance of, योजनशतम् hundred yojanas, सागरसम्प्लवे in the surging high seas, क्षिप्त: was cast away.
translation: Smitten by that powerful Manavaastra, Maricha was thrown to a full distance of hundred yojanas into the surging high seas.

text:
विचेतनं विघूर्णन्तं शीतेषु बलताडितम्।

निरस्तं दृश्य मारीचं रामो लक्ष्मणमब्रवीत्।।1.30.18।।
meaning: शीतेषु बलताडितम् beaten by the power of that cool astra, विचेतनम् without senses, विघूर्णन्त म् reeling, निरस्तम् thrown at a distance, मारीचम् Maricha, दृश्य having seen, राम: Rama, लक्ष्मणम् addressing Lakshmana, अब्रवीत् spoke.
translation: Having seen Maricha beaten by the power of that coolarrowed astra, thrown to a distance, reeling and lying unconscious, Rama spoke to Lakshmana:

text:
पश्य लक्ष्मण शीतेषुं मानवं धर्मसंहितम्।

मोहयित्वा नयत्येनं न च प्राणैर्व्ययुज्यत।।1.30.19।।
meaning: लक्ष्मण O Lakshmana, धर्मसंहितम् associated with righteousness, मानवं शीतेषुम् Manava astra employing cool arrow, पश्य behold, एनं मोहयित्वा making him unconscious, नयति is carrying away, प्राणै: with his life, न व्ययुज्यत he is not separated.
translation: "O Lakshmana behold this Manavaastra associated with righteousness employing a cool arrow, which carries him away by making him unconscious and yet not taking his life.

text:
इमानपि वधिष्यामि निर्घृणान् दुष्टचारिण:।

राक्षसान् पापकर्मस्थान् यज्ञघ्नान् रुधिराशनान्।।1.30.20।।
meaning: निर्घृणान् merciless, दुष्टचारिण: of wicked behaviour, पापकर्मस्थान् doers of sinful acts, यज्ञघ्नान् destroyers of sacrifices, रुधिराशनान् blood-thirsty, इमान् राक्षसानपि these rakshasas also, वधिष्यामि I will slay them.
translation: "I shall slay these merciless, wicked, doers of sinful acts, destroyers of sacrifices and blood-thirsty rakshasas".

text:
सङ्गृह्यास्त्रं ततो रामो दिव्यमाग्नेयमद्भुतम्।

सुबाहूरसि चिक्षेप सविद्ध: प्रापतद्भुवि।।1.30.21।।
meaning: तत: then, राम: Rama, दिव्यम् celestial, अद्भुतम् marvellous, आग्नेयास्त्रम् Agneya weapon, सङ्गृह्य having taken, सुबाहूरसि in the chest of Subahu, चिक्षेप hurled, स: he, विद्ध: having been struck down, भुवि on the ground, प्रापतत् fell down.
translation: Then Rama took hold of the celestial, marvellous Agneya weapon and hurled it into the chest of Subahu. Struck, Subahuhe fell down on the ground.

text:
शेषान् वायव्यमादाय निजघान महायशा:।

राघव: परमोदारो मुनीनां मुदमावहन्।।1.30.22।।
meaning: महायशा: illustrious, परमोदार: highly generous, राघव: Rama, मुनीनाम् for Ascetics, मुदम् delight, आवहन् causing, वायव्यम् Vayavya weapon, आदाय seizing, शेषान् remaining, निजघान killed.
translation: Illustrious and highly generous Rama killed the remaining rakshasas with the Vayavya weapon to the delight of the ascetics.

text:
स हत्वा राक्षसान् सर्वान् यज्ञघ्नान् रघुनन्दन:।

ऋषिभि: पूजितस्तत्र यथेन्द्रो विजये पुरा।।1.30.23।।
meaning: रघुनन्दन: Rama, यज्ञघ्नान् obstructors of sacrifice, राक्षसान् rakshasas, सर्वान् all, हत्वा having killed, पुरा formerly, विजये when victorious, इन्द्र: यथा like Indra, तत्र there, ऋषिभि: by saints, पूजित: was worshipped.
translation: Having killed the rakshasas, obstructors of sacrifices, Rama was worshipped by the hermits like Indra was honoured in the past when he was victorious.

text:
अथ यज्ञे समाप्ते तु विश्वामित्रो महामुनि:।

निरीतिका दिशो दृष्टवा काकुत्स्थमिदमब्रवीत्।।1.30.24।।
meaning: अथ thereafter, यज्ञे when the sacrifice, समाप्ते was completed, विश्वामित्र: महामुनि: maharshi Visvamitra, निरीतिका:दिश: all the directions bereft of evils, दृष्टवा after beholding, काकुत्स्थम् addressing Rama, इदम् these words, अब्रवीत् uttered.
translation: Thereafter, when the sacrifice was completed, maharshi Viswamitra beholding all the directions bereft of evils, said to Rama:
